pages.text: Meet the individuals behind Asolo Repertory Theatre’s success. Our Board of Directors guides operations and champions artistic innovation.
Every donation to Asolo Rep helps support the arts and fuel creativity. Support Sarasota’s vibrant arts community today.
Explore the team behind Asolo Repertory Theatre. Their hard work behind the scenes makes world-class theatre experiences possible.
Discover Asolo Rep, one of the top professional theatres in Florida and a national leader in delivering provocative productions.
Get help with your Asolo Rep tickets and subscriptions. Our box office team is ready to assist you via phone, email, or in-person.

$14,999* Co-produce a play of your choice and invitation for 2 to Opening Night dinner and performance of the selected play* Access to new play development process, including invitations to closed readings Invitation to a dress rehearsal Additional recognition in your show’s playbill* Plus all benefits listed above Conductor — $15,000+ Co-produce a musical or world premiere of your choice and invitation for 2 to Opening Night dinner and show of selected musical* Access to the new play development process, including invitations to closed readings Invitation to a dress rehearsal Additional recognition in your show’s playbill Plus benefits listed at Benefactor level Investor — $20,000+ Lunch with Asolo leadership Invitation for 2 to an Opening Night dinner of your choice Access to the new play development process including invitations to closed readings Invitation to private dress rehearsals Plus all benefits listed above Presenter — $30,000+ Invitation for 2 to all Opening Night dinners and shows Recognition as a Presenter on all show materials Intimate dinner with leading playwright, director, or artist Plus all benefits listed above Contact Our Team Have a question or need assistance? MORE ON WAYS TO GIVE Individual Giving Legacy Giving Our People Support Us Production History Education & Engagement END Individual Fellowship Make the Magic Possible Make a donation that truly makes a difference. Your gift to Asolo Repertory Theatre empowers incredible artistry, world-class experiences and unparalleled community programming. SUPPORT THE FSU/ASOLO CONSERVATORY For more than 50 years, the FSU/Asolo Conservatory for Actor Training and Asolo Repertory Theatre have shared a distinctive partnership - uniting a nationally respected graduate training program with a leading professional regional theatre. As one of the last remaining actor conservatories in the country, the FSU/Asolo Conservatory provides rigorous, comprehensive training in acting, movement, voice, and related disciplines. Students also gain invaluable experience by performing alongside union actors in Asolo Rep's mainstage season, preparing them to launch successful careers in the field. Though Asolo Rep and the Conservatory operate as separate institutions with distinct budgets and administrative structures, their relationship has flourished over the past four decades. Gifts to Asolo Rep in support of the Conservatory help fund student fellowship stipends and the transformative London Study semester. $75 $125 $250 $500 $1000 $3000 Recognition Name We are pleased to recognize gifts over $125 in the season program book. Please enter your name as you would like it to appear in the program: I wish to remain anonymous This is a gift in honor/In Memory of someone We are pleased to recognize your gift in honor of or in memory of another Please enter the name(s) as you would like it to appear in the program book: Please Select In honor of In memory of Donate Now FSU/Asolo Conservatory Donor Membership Benefits:
  • Access to e-newsletter
  • Access to pre and post-show engagement events
  • 10% Discount to Asolo Rep Gift Shop
  • Early access to all Asolo Adventures and Excursions
  • Invitations to annual Luminary events
Conservatory Supporter — $125 - $499 Core Benefits in Common with Asolo Rep Donors: Access to e-newsletter 10% Discount to Asolo Rep Gift Shop Listing in season program book Invitation to Halo Day (production shop tour) Conservatory Enthusiast — $500+ Core Benefits in Common with Asolo Rep Donors: Access to e-newsletter 10% Discount to Asolo Rep Gift Shop Listing in season program book Invitation to Halo Day (production shop tour) Exclusive: Invitation to Open Classes Invitation to Annual Meet and Greet Invitation to graduation ceremony Opportunity to see the final understudy run-throughs as the dates are announced throughout the season And other benefits TBD Conservatory Benefactor — $5000+ All Conservatory Enthusiast Benefits Above, Plus: Donor concierge service from the Development Staff and Box Office Photo recognition in the season program book Invitation to Major Donor events including the Welcome Back Party and the Season Announcement Party Exclusive: Invitation to launch of the Touring Show Invitation to Conservatory Opening Night performances and after-parties Invitation to Annual Graduate Student/Sponsor brunch Meet-the-Faculty events (preceding open classes) Invitation to graduation ceremony and reception Invitation to table read (first rehearsal) of a Conservatory production And other benefits TBD Contact Our Team Have a question or need assistance? Contact development@asolo.org or call 941-351-9010 ext 4700 . From workshops to talkbacks, Asolo Rep’s Sarasota community events bring people together through the power of storytelling and the arts.
Explore the team behind Asolo Repertory Theatre. Our staff and board members share a deep commitment to storytelling and community.
Discover Asolo Rep’s special events in Sarasota—unique opportunities to connect with artists, directors, and the local arts community.
Blend business and art by sponsoring Asolo Repertory Theatre. Learn how corporate donors help bring bold theatre productions to life.
